title: Review Outside Counsel Bills
description: An in-house counsel needs to review invoices from an outside law firm for compliance with the company's billing guidelines.

tasks.description: Ingest the invoice from the outside law firm.
Automatically check the line items against the company's billing guidelines (e.g., flag for block billing, time entries from unauthorized timekeepers).
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags several non-compliant time entries.

tasks.description: Generate a report of the non-compliant entries to be discussed with the outside firm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear report to facilitate a discussion about adjusting the bill.
